text:
Putnam Exam | 2018: B2

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { Putnam } 2018: B 2 \\\nf_{n}(z)=z^{n-1}+2 z^{n-2}+\cdots+n \\\nf_{n}(z) \neq 0 \forall|z| \leq 1\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Putnam } 2018: B 2 [/imath] [imath]f_{n}(z)=z^{n-1}+2 z^{n-2}+\cdots+n [/imath] [imath]f_{n}(z) eq 0 \forall|z| \leq 1[/imath]
